The series has grossed over $1.8 billion in worldwide and grossed $35.7 million on its opening day. The first part Twilight was released on November 2008, The Twilight Saga: New Moon followed on November 2009, The Twilight Saga: Eclipse was hit on June 30, 2010. And a two-part adaptation of the last installment Breaking Dawn began shooting in November 2010 and is scheduled for release on November 18, 2011 and November 16, 2012.
